，所以两直线共面且不平行，即两直线交于一点，应选(A).

content.math_content: \iint_ {\Sigma} a x \mathrm {d} y \mathrm {d} z + (z + a) ^ {2} \mathrm {d} x \mathrm {d} y = \iint_ {\Sigma + \Sigma_ {0}} a x \mathrm {d} y \mathrm {d} z + (z + a) ^ {2} \mathrm {d} x \mathrm {d} y - \iint_ {\Sigma_ {0}} a x \mathrm {d} y \mathrm {d} z + (z + a) ^ {2} \mathrm {d} x \mathrm {d} y,

\begin{array}{l} \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \left(\frac {\sin \frac {\pi}{n}}{n + 1} + \frac {\sin \frac {2 \pi}{n}}{n + \frac {1}{2}} + \dots + \frac {\sin \frac {n \pi}{n}}{n + \frac {1}{n}}\right) = \int_ {0} ^ {1} \sin \pi x d x = \frac {1}{\pi} \int_ {0} ^ {1} \sin \pi x d (\pi x) \\ = \frac {1}{\pi} \int_ {0} ^ {\pi} \sin x d x = \frac {2}{\pi}. \\ \end{array}
